WorkItem.Description: If i disable epic gems for a cheap twink or add haste instead of crit gems, the Optimizer simly ignores the choices and always uses the Epic games, even if they are disabled.

Comments.Message: Not a bug. The optimizer will use any gems that are marked available. Gems in active gemming templates are also considered available (that's an option that's on by default). You probably still have the gems marked available.
nope i have not enabled them in the gem template, there is no mark for sure.
That's what I said. You've disabled the gemming template(s), but you still have the gems marked active.
In the comparison pane (right hand side of the Rawr window) select "Slot" => "Gems" => "All Normal"     and click on the green diamonds next to the epic gems to stop the optimiser using them.
